title: Girls & Panzer: Saishuushou Part 2
original_name: 『ガールズ＆パンツァー 最終章』第 2 話
opening_song: "Grand symphony" by Sayaka Sasaki (佐咲紗花)
ending_song: "Enter Enter MISSION! Saishuushou ver. (Enter Enter MISSION！最終章 ver.)" by Ankou Team (あんこうチーム)
sinopse: The second film in the six-part Girls & Panzer: Saishuushou film series. Oorai team wins against the BC Academy team and moves onto the next round where they find themselves up against Chi-Ha Tan Academy. However, the Japanese-style school has changed up their strategy. How will Oorai react to this?
